title: Caroline Garcia
summary: Caroline Garcia (French pronunciation: ​[kaʁɔlin ɡaʁsja]; Spanish: García, pronounced [ɡaɾˈθi.a]; born 16 October 1993) is a French professional tennis player.[1] She has won seven singles and six doubles titles on the WTA Tour, one singles and one doubles title on the WTA 125K series, as well as one singles title and four doubles titles on the ITF Circuit. On 10 September 2018, she reached her best singles ranking of world No. 4, and on 24 October 2016 she peaked at No. 2 in the WTA doubles rankings, tied with fellow Frenchwoman Kristina Mladenovic.
